translation.en: You know how I came up with the idea for the Triple-X program?
translation.zh: 你知道xXx计划是怎么来的吗？

translation.en: Skateboards and swimming pools.
translation.zh: 滑板和泳池

translation.en: Skateboards used to be stuck on the ground.
translation.zh: 滑板本来只是在地面上给青少年玩的

translation.en: Adolescent transportation. Then 1977 happens.
translation.zh: 滑板本来只是在地面上给青少年玩的 但在1977年产生革命性变化

translation.en: Big drought hits Southern California.
translation.zh: 南加州面临一场大旱灾

translation.en: Got so bad, rich suburbanites couldn't afford to fill their swimming pools.
translation.zh: 严重到郊区豪宅的泳池全都干涸

translation.en: That's when the light clicked on.
translation.zh: 这时有一个青少年灵机一动

translation.en: Some kid figured out he could skate those empty pools
translation.zh: 这时有一个青少年灵机一动 利用这些干涸泳池靠滑板腾空飞跃

translation.en: and get some real nasty air.
translation.zh: 利用这些干涸泳池靠滑板腾空飞跃

translation.en: Dogtown and Z-Boys. You ever seen it? It's a movie.
translation.zh: 你看过《狗镇和滑板少年》这部电影吗？

translation.en: No? Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Anyhow, our hero starts doing things on a board
translation.zh: 这位少年英雄用滑板做出

translation.en: that no one's ever seen before.
translation.zh: 没有人见过的高难度动作

translation.en: Things the world thought were impossible.
translation.zh: 世人认为不可能的动作

translation.en: Now, that kid needed that drought.
translation.zh: 那小子需要那场旱灾

translation.en: The world needed those empty pools.
translation.zh: 世界需要那些干涸的泳池

translation.en: That's why Triple-X.
translation.zh: 所以才有xXx计划

translation.en: Do you feel safer today than you felt yesterday? I know I don't.
translation.zh: 你觉得世界变得更安全吗？我不觉得

translation.en: The biggest, most expensive military in the world,
translation.zh: 美国是全世界军力最强大的国家

translation.en: and we're still scared of shoe and tighty-whitey bombs at the airport.
translation.zh: 但还是害怕机场有鞋子和内裤炸弹

translation.en: Why is that?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Because soldiers are built to take orders and fight wars.
translation.zh: 因为士兵只会奉命作战

translation.en: But we, my friend, are not at war.
translation.zh: 但我们并没有面临任何战争

translation.en: We are at peril.
translation.zh: 而是随时随地会发生的恐怖攻击

translation.en: That's why Triple-X.
translation.zh: 所以才需要xXx计划

translation.en: What's the matter? You on a diet? You ain't hungry?
translation.zh: 怎么？你在减肥？不饿吗？

translation.en: [speaking Portuguese] It's seven-thirty in the morning.
translation.zh: 现在是一大早7点半

translation.en: So? It's lunch or dinnertime somewhere in the world.
translation.zh: 总有某些地方是中晚饭时间 快吃

translation.en: Come on, eat up!
translation.zh: 快啊 快吃啊！

translation.en: You know who does feel safe? The men in charge. The world beaters.
translation.zh: 你知道谁觉得安全？掌权者、国家领导

translation.en: The top-shelf, par excellence ayatollahs with all the "dollahs."
translation.zh: 有钱有势、位高权重的大人物

translation.en: And that's because those righteous bastards,
translation.zh: 这些自以为是的烂人

translation.en: somewhere along the way, made a deal with the devil.
translation.zh: 这些自以为是的烂人 和魔鬼做交易 用自由交换安全

translation.en: They traded liberty for safety.
translation.zh: 和魔鬼做交易 用自由交换安全

translation.en: And us, we the people, ended up losing both.
translation.zh: 而我们这些死老百姓 自由安全都失去所以才需要xXx计划

translation.en: That's why Triple-X.
translation.zh: 自由安全都失去所以才需要xXx计划

translation.en: While everybody else is stuck on the ground,
translation.zh: 当大家只能在地面行动

translation.en: we're doing shit on the board, nobody's ever even seen before.
translation.zh: 我们用极限运动做出惊人之举

translation.en: [sighs] Well, that's my pitch.
translation.zh: 这就是我的提案

translation.en: I always was a better spy than a salesman.
translation.zh: 我当特工一向都比当推销员好

translation.en: So, what do you say?
translation.zh: 你觉得如何？

translation.en: [speaking Portuguese] I'm no hero. I'm just a footballer.
translation.zh: 我不是英雄 只是个足球员

translation.en: My bad.
translation.zh: 我的错

translation.en: So, I'll leave you be, then. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 那我就先走了

translation.en: Who said there's no such thing as a free meal?
translation.zh: 谁说天下没有白吃的…饭？

translation.en: -Down on the ground, now! -[gun cocks] Give me the money!
translation.zh: 趴下来！把钱给我！

translation.en: Don't move! Hurry up!
translation.zh: 别动！ 快点！

translation.en: Goal!
translation.zh: 射门得分！

translation.en: And you say you're no hero.
translation.zh: 你还说你不是英雄

translation.en: I got to call bullshit on that!
translation.zh: 你明明就是在唬弄我

translation.en: You're exactly the kind of hero the world needs.
translation.zh: 你正是这世界需要的英雄

translation.en: At the end of the day,
translation.zh: 这又回到我这20年来

translation.en: it comes down to the same question I've been asking my wife
translation.zh: 这又回到我这20年来 每周五晚上问我老婆的问题

translation.en: every Friday night for the last 20 years.
translation.zh: 每周五晚上问我老婆的问题

translation.en: Do you want some of this? Or are you just gonna...
translation.zh: 你到底要不要？ 或者你只是…

translation.en: -[automated voice] Access granted. -[elevator dings]
translation.zh: 允许进入

translation.en: [Marke] Okay, you may sit.
translation.zh: 你们都坐吧

translation.en: Gentlemen,
translation.zh: 各位

translation.en: this is the device that crashed the satellite and killed Gibbons.
translation.zh: 这就是让人造卫星坠落砸死吉本斯的装置

translation.en: Nerds in the lab have coined it "Pandora's Box."
translation.zh: 实验室的书呆子称之为“潘多拉之盒”

translation.en: My team backtracked the satellite's last signal input to Miami.
translation.zh: 发送到人造卫星最后的信号来自迈阿密

translation.en: Some asshole living the high life at the Ritz-Carlton penthouse
translation.zh: 住在顶级饭店阁楼套房的混蛋

translation.en: thought he could hold the world ransom.
translation.zh: 以为他能勒索全世界

translation.en: Three flashbangs, two bullets,
translation.zh: 我们用了三枚闪光弹 两颗子弹和一个尸袋

translation.en: and one body bag later, we took custody of the device.
translation.zh: 两颗子弹和一个尸袋 拿到这个装置

translation.en: We must have over 100 redundancies in place
translation.zh: 我们必须安装一百多种防护措施

translation.en: to prevent some punk with a laptop from hijacking satellites.
translation.zh: 防止浑球用笔电骇入人造卫星

translation.en: And Pandora's Box can bypass all of them.
translation.zh: 潘多拉之盒能够破解一切防护措施

translation.en: With the push of a button, it can eavesdrop on secure communications,
translation.zh: 按一个钮就能窃听机密通讯

translation.en: corrupt military software, transmit false intelligence,
translation.zh: 破坏军事软件、发送假情报

translation.en: or crash a satellite out of the sky like a goddamn tactical warhead.
translation.zh: 或是把人造卫星变成战略导弹

translation.en: One of you is behind this.
translation.zh: 你们其中有一人是幕后主使

translation.en: And I am not leaving here until I find out who.
translation.zh: 我查出是谁之前不会离开

translation.en: You fight me with a book?
translation.zh: 你想用一本书打我？

translation.en: Here you go, brother. Chapter one! Page one!
translation.zh: 我就让你读书 第一章！ 第一页！

translation.en: Shit happens.
translation.zh: 算你倒霉

translation.en: You're late!
translation.zh: 你迟到了！

translation.en: -Just in time, boss. -[tires screeching]
translation.zh: 我来得刚刚好 老大

translation.en: [MI6 Control] They bust in here, step on our throats,
translation.zh: 他们闯进来把我们打得落花流水

translation.en: and take the one device that can cause a global power shift.
translation.zh: 夺走足以造成全球权力转移的装置

translation.en: So how do we get it back?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么把它夺回来？

translation.en: These assholes just took out the best of the best like it was Sunday brunch.
translation.zh: 那些狠角色毫不费力解决了顶尖探员

translation.en: We need someone who can move like them, fight like them.
translation.zh: 我们需要跟他们一样狠的角色

translation.en: We need someone who can walk into a tornado,
translation.zh: 我们需要一个能走进龙卷风

translation.en: and come out the other side like it was a damn gentle breeze.
translation.zh: 然后毫发无伤走出来的高手

translation.en: You know someone like that?
translation.zh: 你认识这样的人吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不认识

translation.en: But Gibbons did.
translation.zh: 但是吉本斯认识

translation.en: -What you doing? -That's loco, chico!
translation.zh: -你在干啥？-他疯了！

translation.en: Xander!
translation.zh: 桑德！

translation.en: -[man] Xander! -[laughs]
translation.zh: 桑德！

translation.en: [speaking Spanish] Hey, friend.
translation.zh: 喂 朋友

translation.en: [speaking Spanish] Give me a second.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: -Gracias, amigo. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 谢谢你 先生！

translation.en: [sports announcer] And here we go, we are underway!
translation.zh: 球赛正式开始！

translation.en: [speaking Spanish] I knew you would do it, Xander. You brought the world to us.
translation.zh: 我就知道你做得到你把世界带给我们

translation.en: The world is big, but always fits in your heart.
translation.zh: 世界虽大 但你可以把它放在心中

translation.en: Take it with you always.
translation.zh: 你要永远放眼世界

translation.en: Go, go, go.
translation.zh: 快去看球赛

translation.en: [Lola] Of course, Xander Cage can't pay the satellite company,
translation.zh: 桑德凯吉当然可以付卫星电视费

translation.en: just like a regular guy. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 就像平凡老百姓一样

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 那又怎样？

translation.en: And line the pockets of some boardroom billionaires?
translation.zh: 让那些亿万富豪口袋满满吗？

translation.en: You know,
translation.zh: 你得知道

translation.en: these days, a regular guy can't afford to be regular.
translation.zh: 这年头 连当平凡老百姓都很困难

translation.en: -[grunts] -Let's go.
translation.zh: -上来-走吧

translation.en: [man] World getting smaller?
translation.zh: 世界变得更小了 对吧？

translation.en: I know the feeling.
translation.zh: 我知道这种感觉

translation.en: Running from your problems never works out.
translation.zh: 逃避问题绝对不是办法

translation.en: You need a new plan.
translation.zh: 你需要全新的计划

translation.en: -I need a new map. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我需要全新的地图

translation.en: Don't say I didn't warn you.
translation.zh: 别说我没有警告过你

translation.en: Oh, boy.
translation.zh: 这下好了

translation.en: Here we go again.
translation.zh: 又来了

translation.en: Down! Get down! Don't move, asshole!
translation.zh: 别动 混球！

translation.en: On your knees now, you son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 给我跪下 王八蛋！

translation.en: Okay, okay. I want to comply. I really wanna comply. But you're confusing me.
translation.zh: 我真的很想听话 但我被搞混了

translation.en: "Don't move, you asshole. On your knees, you son of a bitch." Which is it?
translation.zh: 你叫我别动 那我该怎么跪下来？

translation.en: -You have three seconds to comply! -You're not good at this.
translation.zh: -你有三秒！-你真的很笨

translation.en: -One! -[sighs]
translation.zh: 一！

translation.en: Two!
translation.zh: 二！

translation.en: Okay!
translation.zh: 够了！

translation.en: Come on out, Frankenstein!
translation.zh: 出来吧 科学怪人！

translation.en: Gibbons!
translation.zh: 吉本斯！吉本斯？

translation.en: -Gibbons? -Olly-olly-oxen-free.
translation.zh: 吉本斯！吉本斯？ 我就不再躲猫猫了

translation.en: Wow. You really do look different, Gibbons.
translation.zh: 你完全变了个样 吉本斯

translation.en: Did you lose weight?
translation.zh: 是不是减肥啦？

translation.en: Augustus always had such, well,
translation.zh: 奥古斯向来都对你

translation.en: not exactly nice things to say about you.
translation.zh: 没说过什么好话

translation.en: When did you realize it was all fake?
translation.zh: 你什么时候发现这全是假的？

translation.en: You mean the clown show?
translation.zh: 你是说这场马戏团表演？

translation.en: You had a guy over there wearing $1,000 Beats
translation.zh: 那家伙戴着一千美金的名牌耳机

translation.en: when you can buy the knockoff for half the price.
translation.zh: 山寨版只要一半的价钱

translation.en: Or the lady that was running to catch a bus that doesn't leave for two hours.
translation.zh: 那位小姐要搭的公交车两小时后才会开车

translation.en: Or the security guard over there buying a soda with foreign currency?
translation.zh: 还有那个警卫用外币买汽水？

translation.en: Oh, you know what the kicker was?
translation.zh: 你知道最扯的是什么吗？

translation.en: Clarence from It's a Wonderful Life.
translation.zh: 《生活多美好》一片中的守护天使

translation.en: The nice old man that you had sit down next to me with the bag of bombs?
translation.zh: 那个拿着一袋炸弹坐我旁边的老头？

translation.en: Just happened to know I spoke English.
translation.zh: 这么刚好知道我会讲英文

translation.en: Go figure.
translation.zh: 有够扯的

translation.en: -The bullets could've been real. -Then the body armor would've been real.
translation.zh: -子弹可能是真的-防弹衣就会是真的

translation.en: I don't know you, but... I don't like to be tested.
translation.zh: 我不认识你 但我不喜欢被测试

translation.en: Gibbons never believed you were dead! Never stopped looking for you.
translation.zh: 吉本斯一直不信你死了也一直在找你

translation.en: -Hell of a friend. -Yeah, well, the joke's on him.
translation.zh: -真是个好朋友-那也太好笑了

translation.en: -'Cause we were never friends. -Oh, trust me, he's not laughing.
translation.zh: -我们从来就不是朋友-他并没有笑

translation.en: Nor will he ever again, for that matter.
translation.zh: 以后也不会再笑了

translation.en: [Marke] I've never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: 我从来没见过这种事

translation.en: This group is lethal, and they don't care who or what gets in their way.
translation.zh: 这些人心狠手辣 谁敢挡路谁就死

translation.en: I was hoping you'd be interested in headlining the next fight card.
translation.zh: 我希望你有兴趣率队阻止他们

translation.en: [Xander] Seventy feet across, 90 feet down.
translation.zh: （跳跃分析） 大楼间隔21米、高27.5米

translation.en: Three inches of security glass?
translation.zh: 7.6公分厚的强化玻璃？

translation.en: No rope. No line. No chute.
translation.zh: 没用绳索、钢丝或降落伞

translation.en: I bet they had a blast.
translation.zh: 我打赌他们玩得很开心

translation.en: We ran facial IDs on every database in the world.
translation.zh: 全球的人脸辨识数据库都查不到他们

translation.en: Nothing. Not even a match on a speeding ticket.
translation.zh: 全球的人脸辨识数据库都查不到他们 他们连超速罚单都没拿过

translation.en: They're ghosts, in a day and age where that kind of thing is almost impossible.
translation.zh: 他们是幽灵 这年头 那是不可能的事

translation.en: Okay,
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: you get that I don't work for suits.
translation.zh: 你知道我不搞政府企业那一套

translation.en: What makes you think I'm gonna want to ruin all their fun?
translation.zh: 你怎么以为我想打扰他们的玩兴？

translation.en: Well, if you won't do it for me,
translation.zh: 这么说吧 如果你不帮我

translation.en: do it for Gibbons.
translation.zh: 就算是帮吉本斯吧

translation.en: Your country needs you, Mr. Cage. The Triple-X program needs you.
translation.zh: 你的国家需要你 xXx计划需要你

translation.en: It's time to be a patriot.
translation.zh: 该发挥你的爱国心了

translation.en: By whose definition?
translation.zh: 那是谁下的定义？

translation.en: The last time I was patriotic, I got three strikes.
translation.zh: 上次我发挥爱国心时被判了三项罪名

translation.en: And there was only one man who believed in the underdog.
translation.zh: 当时只有一个人相信小人物能立大功

translation.en: Patriotism is dead.
translation.zh: 现在没有爱国者只有叛乱者和独裁者

translation.en: -There's only rebels and tyrants now. -So, which are you?
translation.zh: 现在没有爱国者只有叛乱者和独裁者 你是哪一种？

translation.en: I'm Triple-X.
translation.zh: 我是极限特工

translation.en: Well, welcome back, Triple-X.
translation.zh: 欢迎你重返极限

translation.en: Uh, where are you going?
translation.zh: 你要去哪里？

translation.en: -London. -Why? What's in London?
translation.zh: -伦敦-伦敦有什么？

translation.en: A ghost hunter.
translation.zh: 一个幽灵猎人

translation.en: And possibly, my fur coat.
translation.zh: 可能还有我的毛皮大衣

translation.en: I'd forgotten how beautiful the view is up here.
translation.zh: 我忘了这上面有多美

translation.en: Oh, I, uh, see you found your coat.
translation.zh: 看来你找到你的毛皮大衣了

translation.en: Well, you promised to take care of it for me.
translation.zh: 你答应要替我好好保管

translation.en: And I did.
translation.zh: 我有

translation.en: So, I'm looking for someone.
translation.zh: 我在找一群人

translation.en: Since when have we had a business relationship?
translation.zh: 我们几时开始成了工作伙伴？

translation.en: I get caught even touching a computer, my ass goes away for 20.
translation.zh: 我只要碰电脑就会被关20年

translation.en: [Xander] Name your price. You know I'm good for it.
translation.zh: 你尽管开价 你知道我说话算话

translation.en: Information like this doesn't have a price.
translation.zh: 这种资料是买不到的

translation.en: [Xander] Ainsley, everything has a price.
translation.zh: 安丝莉 一切都买得到

translation.en: Now, if you don't think you can pull it off,
translation.zh: 要是你的功力大不如前

translation.en: if you lost your edge, just tell me and I'll understand.
translation.zh: 做不到的话就说 我能理解

translation.en: -You wanna know what it is, Cage? -What?
translation.zh: 你知道我为何迟疑？ 什么？

translation.en: I used to think you were the man.
translation.zh: 我以前觉得你是老大哥

translation.en: But now, I don't know, maybe I feel like you're just working for him.
translation.zh: 但现在 我认为你在替他做事

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Nobody knows I'm here.
translation.zh: 没人知道我在这里

translation.en: And you know how I am about keeping secrets.
translation.zh: 你也知道我绝对会守口如瓶

translation.en: So you say, but Interpol's got these new listening bugs.
translation.zh: 国际刑警组织有全新的窃听装置

translation.en: They're practically invisible. Real MI6 kind of shit.
translation.zh: 肉眼看不见 来自英国军情六处

translation.en: Disappear on your skin, under your arms,
translation.zh: 注射在皮肤和手臂底下

translation.en: tied around your balls like a Christmas bow.
translation.zh: 或是挂在你的那话儿上面

translation.en: Unwrap me, then.
translation.zh: 那就把我脱光搜身

translation.en: You know, studies have proven that sexual consummation
translation.zh: 研究指出性交会完全毁掉

translation.en: irrevocably ruins nine out of 10 relationships.
translation.zh: 研究指出性交会完全毁掉 十之八九的男女关系

translation.en: Lucky for me, you love to gamble.
translation.zh: 幸好你喜欢赌博

translation.en: Of course...
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: ...not.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: My friends, on the other hand, adore stiff odds.
translation.zh: 但我的朋友们喜欢下大注

translation.en: Stiff odds?
translation.zh: 下大注？

translation.en: The things I do for my country.
translation.zh: 我为国家真的牺牲很大

translation.en: Like finding needles in a stack of needles.
translation.zh: 这就像在海里捞针一样

translation.en: Even though you're shackled by the Queen,
translation.zh: 你虽然被铐得牢牢的

translation.en: you're still the best in the world.
translation.zh: 还是全世界最厉害的黑客

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: Do yourself a favor. Burn this.
translation.zh: 你最好还是把这烧了

translation.en: The whispers I hear, these ghosts of yours are the real kind of trouble.
translation.zh: 你在找的这些凶灵恶鬼不好惹

translation.en: They've got training, they've got funding, and they've got no problem
translation.zh: 他们受过训练、资金雄厚 对挡路者绝对不会手下留情

translation.en: running over anyone who gets in their way.
translation.zh: 对挡路者绝对不会手下留情

translation.en: Okay, so, you're worried that I might get hurt?
translation.zh: 你担心我会受伤？

translation.en: I'm worried you might get dead.
translation.zh: 我担心你会挂掉

translation.en: You know, I'm touched that you can imagine a world without me in it.
translation.zh: 谢谢你能想象没有我的世界

translation.en: It'll be a little less fun.
translation.zh: 那个世界会比较不好玩

translation.en: That's all I'm saying.
translation.zh: 我只是这个意思

translation.en: Your ghosts are hanging out in the Philippines.
translation.zh: 你要找的幽灵正在菲律宾

translation.en: Figures they'd go to the Pacific.
translation.zh: 我就猜他们会去东南亚

translation.en: Some jungle rave that's off the grid.
translation.zh: 他们在丛林里庆功没人找得到

translation.en: How the hell did you find it so quickly?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么快就找到了？

translation.en: Undercover work.
translation.zh: 卧底行动

translation.en: Where is it? What did you do with Pandora's Box?
translation.zh: 你把潘多拉之盒放在哪里？

translation.en: It's in a safe place.
translation.zh: 安全的地方

translation.en: That wasn't a part of the plan.
translation.zh: 这不在计划之中

translation.en: After all these years, you're still shocked when I improvise?
translation.zh: 经过这么多年 我还是会让你吃惊？

translation.en: No. But the mission was to destroy it.
translation.zh: 不 只是我们的任务是摧毁它

translation.en: Turns out there's a new mission.
translation.zh: 现在有新的任务

translation.en: I'm not gonna destroy the one thing I can use to get what we want.
translation.zh: 我才不会摧毁能让我们如愿以偿的东西

translation.en: -The whole world is looking for us, Xiang. -Let them come!
translation.zh: -全世界都在找我们-尽管找啊！

translation.en: You worry about pawn sacrifice.
translation.zh: 你担心我会牺牲小兵小卒

translation.en: I got my eye on the king.
translation.zh: 我一直在盯着国王

translation.en: That's the problem.
translation.zh: 这就是你的问题

translation.en: You forgot the queen.
translation.zh: 你忘了还有王后

translation.en: [Marke] After your success taking down Anarchy 99,
translation.zh: （英国莱肯西思皇家空军基地） 你瓦解无政府99后有人给了吉本斯一张空白支票

translation.en: Gibbons was handed a blank check.
translation.zh: 你瓦解无政府99后有人给了吉本斯一张空白支票

translation.en: Which is the long way of saying
translation.zh: 其实我只是想说

translation.en: he got you a new ride.
translation.zh: 他替你买了一架新飞机

translation.en: World went and got an upgrade since you died, Cage.
translation.zh: 你死后的科技可是日新月异

translation.en: Onboard drones, anti-air countermeasures,
translation.zh: 机上有无人机、防空武器

translation.en: and fuel tanks big enough
translation.zh: 油箱大到可以让你不用降落

translation.en: to circumnavigate the globe three times without ever landing.
translation.zh: 油箱大到可以让你不用降落 就能绕地球三次

translation.en: You can check your coat. I promise you, no one would dare steal it.
translation.zh: 把毛皮大衣放着 没人敢偷啦

translation.en: I can't guarantee it won't walk off on its own.
translation.zh: 我可不保证它会自己跑掉

translation.en: Wheels up in 10, boys! Which means you're already seven minutes behind.
translation.zh: 10分钟后起飞 你们已经晚了7分钟

translation.en: Is she always this much fun, or just on special occasions?
translation.zh: 她随时都这样 还是今天特别凶？

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: No wonder our country's in debt trillions of dollars.
translation.zh: 怪不得美国有几兆美金的国债

translation.en: Do you really need all these gadgets to get the bad guys?
translation.zh: 你们真的需要这些玩意儿抓坏蛋？

translation.en: Oh, we don't need any of it.
translation.zh: 其实并不需要

translation.en: But it makes the catching a hell of a lot more fun.
translation.zh: 不过会让整个过程更好玩

translation.en: Xander Cage. Holy shit!
translation.zh: 桑德凯吉 天啊！

translation.en: Live and in concert, one night only. This is crazy!
translation.zh: 现场演出、仅此一晚 酷毙了

translation.en: I was at Coachella and Guns N' Roses got back together,
translation.zh: 我看过《枪与玫瑰》重组后的那场表演

translation.en: but this is way cooler.
translation.zh: 我看过《枪与玫瑰》重组后的那场表演 这比较酷

translation.en: Well, I wasn't actually there but I, like, heard about it, you know?
translation.zh: 其实我没在现场啦 我只是 听到那消息 知道吧？

translation.en: I'm still talking. Oh, my God. I'm sorry, it's like a bad habit.
translation.zh: 我还在说个不停 我的天啊 抱歉 这是坏习惯 我一说话…

translation.en: I get started and then I can't stop and then I can't...
translation.zh: 抱歉 这是坏习惯 我一说话… -就停不下来-深呼吸

translation.en: Breathe.
translation.zh: -就停不下来-深呼吸

translation.en: Take your time. I know mouth-to-mouth if necessary.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 我会口对口人工呼吸

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Wow! Are you kidding me with those guns? You're like the frickin' Terminator!
translation.zh: 哎哟 你的手臂好壮 你简直就像终结者

translation.en: And I'm not talking about the first Terminator,
translation.zh: 你简直就像终结者 我不是说第一集喔

translation.en: but the second Terminator that goes back to kill the first Terminator.
translation.zh: 而是回去杀人的第二个终结者

translation.en: It was the liquidy metal guy.
translation.zh: 那个液态终结者

translation.en: Agent Clearidge worked closely with Gibbons. She'll handle support for the operation.
translation.zh: 柯探员过去和吉本斯合作负责支持行动

translation.en: And I bet a guy like you needs a lot of support.
translation.zh: 你这种男人一定需要很多支持

translation.en: What are you? Like 220? 230?
Be honest. 250 is the hard max for my swing.
translation.zh: 我的身体最多能承受228斤

translation.en: -Oh, come on. -[laughs] I'm kidding.
translation.zh: -够了-开玩笑的啦

translation.en: It's not like I have a safe word, or anything. It's "kumquat."
translation.zh: 我的安全暗号是“金桔”

translation.en: Never really think about it. [whispers] Kumquat.
translation.zh: 我从没认真想过 金桔

translation.en: -What about you? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你的呢？

translation.en: No. "Safe" isn't in my vocabulary.
translation.zh: 我的字典里没“安全”这两个字

translation.en: Touché. You are Xander Cage. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 明白 你是桑德凯吉

translation.en: Anything you need, Becky can source it within the hour.
translation.zh: 你需要什么 贝姬一小时就能弄到

translation.en: Except for any sort of illegal drugs.
translation.zh: 除了非法毒品

translation.en: Those, I'll have within 15 minutes.
translation.zh: 我15分钟就能弄到

translation.en: Kidding.
translation.zh: 开玩笑的啦

translation.en: But if you need a fifty of Purple Urkle, I am not the girl to ask.
translation.zh: 不过你想爽 千万别来找我

translation.en: [Marke] Okay, Cage, follow me. I'll introduce you to your ground team.
translation.zh: 够了 跟我来见见你的地面小组

translation.en: -Thank you, Becky. -Of course.
translation.zh: -谢了 贝姬-不客气

translation.en: Kumquat.
translation.zh: 金桔

translation.en: Hey, here comes the Red Bull freak show.
translation.zh: 红牛怪来了

translation.en: [Marke] Xander Cage, I want you to meet Paul...
translation.zh: 桑德凯吉 这是保罗…

translation.en: [Xander] Donovan.
translation.zh: 唐纳文

translation.en: Captain Paul Donovan.
translation.zh: 保罗唐纳文上尉

translation.en: I know you. I saw you on TV!
translation.zh: 我认得你 我在电视上看过你

translation.en: The President gave him a medal. That must have been pretty cool, right?
translation.zh: 总统颁给他一面奖章 那一定很酷

translation.en: You guys must have some seriously cool stories to tell.
translation.zh: 你们一定有很多精彩故事

translation.en: Must've seen a lot. I wonder...
translation.zh: 而且见多识广 我很好奇

translation.en: How many of you have ever pulled a freestyle triple backflip
translation.zh: 你们有谁骑着越野单车

translation.en: on a BMX bike before? All of you?
translation.zh: 做过后空翻三圈？全都做过？

translation.en: -No. We don't play on bikes. -[Xander] Oh, you don't play on bikes.
translation.zh: 没有 我们不玩单车 是吗？

translation.en: Any of you ever carve an R4 on a snowboard
translation.zh: 你们有没有在R4级雪地 用雪板割雪滑行

translation.en: while an avalanche is on your booty?
translation.zh: 同时后面正发生一场大雪崩？

translation.en: We're soldiers, hotshot. Not slackers.
translation.zh: 我们是军人 不会耍猴子把戏

translation.en: [Xander] Okay, but you all have HALO jumped over Eastern Europe
translation.zh: 不过你们都用过 标准的重装调度降落伞

translation.en: using a standard-issue armor deployment parachute system. Am I right?
translation.zh: 在东欧执行高跳低开的任务吧？

translation.en: No. We're not all jacked up on Mountain Dew and Red Bull, you asshole.
translation.zh: 没有 我们不是你这种爱喝能量饮料的怪咖

translation.en: -[men laugh] -Where'd you find this guy?
translation.zh: 你从哪里找来这家伙？

translation.en: -[scoffs] -Well there's a first time for everything.
translation.zh: 凡事都有第一次

translation.en: What did you just do? I can't believe this shit.
translation.zh: 你干了什么？这太过分了

translation.en: I'm not gonna have clowns watch my back.
translation.zh: 我不想让一群跳梁小丑保护我

translation.en: I know I'm gonna regret asking you this, but who would you trust?
translation.zh: 我一定会后悔 不过你信任谁？

translation.en: You know, no one has this number.
translation.zh: 没有人有这支手机号码

translation.en: So, what are you up to these days?
translation.zh: 你最近在忙什么？

translation.en: -Me? -[lion roars] -I'm evening the odds. -[man screams]
translation.zh: 我在平衡人兽的比例

translation.en: -[Officer 1] Move in, move in! -[Officer 2] Show me your hands!
translation.zh: -快上 快上！-把手举起来！

translation.en: [Officer 1] Get on the car, now! Behind your back!
translation.zh: 趴在引擎盖上面！

translation.en: It was like that when I got here.
translation.zh: 我来的时候就是这样

translation.en: Nobody gets in unless you're an X-Game participant! You hear me?
translation.zh: 只有极限运动玩家才能进去

translation.en: That guy got through.
translation.zh: 那家伙进去了

translation.en: Hey, get back here!
translation.zh: 你给我回来！

translation.en: Wassup, Nyjah?
translation.zh: 怎么样 尼亚？

translation.en: Lightningbolt and Burrito.
translation.zh: 闪电和卷饼

translation.en: Chad, wassup, bro?
translation.zh: 查得 怎么样？

translation.en: Roberta. I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 诺贝达 回见

translation.en: Show him the love! Give it up for The Hood!
translation.zh: 请大家给帽T小子最热烈的掌声

translation.en: The good, the bad, the extreme,
translation.zh: 极限三镖客

translation.en: and the completely insane.
translation.zh: 疯狂到极点

translation.en: Now, this is a team I can work with.
translation.zh: 这才是我能合作的小组

translation.en: [Marke] I'll make this easy for you.
translation.zh: 我简单解释给你们听

translation.en: These four assholes, very bad guys.
translation.zh: 这四个人是穷凶恶极的狠角色

translation.en: Pandora's Box, very bad thing. We'll land in Manila
translation.zh: 潘多拉之盒是件坏东西 抵达马尼拉后你们设法赶到那座小岛

translation.en: and you will requisition your own transportation to the island.
translation.zh: 抵达马尼拉后你们设法赶到那座小岛

translation.en: Yo, why don't we just nuke this bitch from orbit and call it a day?
translation.zh: 干脆从外太空发射核弹炸了那座小岛

translation.en: Pandora's Box is one of a kind.
translation.zh: 潘多拉之盒独一无二

translation.en: -It needs to be recovered intact. -[Tennyson] Why? What's it do?
translation.zh: 一定要完整无缺地夺回来 为什么？它是什么？

translation.en: -Brainwave scrambler? -It killed Gibbons.
translation.zh: -脑波扰乱器？-它害死了吉本斯

translation.en: All you need to know. The rest is classified.
translation.zh: 知道这点就够了 其他的是最高机密

translation.en: -Brainwave scrambler. -[sniffing] You smell that?
translation.zh: 脑波扰乱器 你们闻到吗？

translation.en: Smells like the same shit in a different suit.
translation.zh: 她跟其他政府官员一样臭

translation.en: You think a dog knows how to work a Frisbee?
translation.zh: 你以为狗狗知道飞盘的原理吗？

translation.en: Master says, "Fetch," and the bitch listens.
translation.zh: 主人叫牠咬 牠就乖乖听话

translation.en: You would look so sexy with a Frisbee in that mouth.
translation.zh: 你咬飞盘一定超性感

translation.en: [Marke] Oh, sweetheart, this is not a game.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这可不是游戏

translation.en: You are all my soldiers now.
translation.zh: 现在你们全是我的士兵

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm not a soldier, I'm a baller.
translation.zh: -才不是 我是玩家-我们像士兵吗？

translation.en: -Do we look like soldiers? -Oh, hell, no.
translation.zh: -才不是 我是玩家-我们像士兵吗？ 当然不像

translation.en: I dropped your soldiers over Eastern Europe. So, why did you leave Lassie behind?
translation.zh: -我已经把士兵丢下去了-干啥留她？

translation.en: This is my operation! You will listen to me.
translation.zh: 这是我的行动 你们要听我的

translation.en: [Adele] Meeting's over.
translation.zh: 会议结束

translation.en: Well, other than that, Mrs. Lincoln, how was the play?
translation.zh: 这位大婶 请问你还有招吗？

translation.en: Oh, hey, that's super-cinch body armor.
translation.zh: 那件防护衣超紧的

translation.en: You've got to tighten the strap...
translation.zh: 你得把这里的扣带

translation.en: ...over here. I got this one.
translation.zh: 扣紧 我来帮你

translation.en: -What are you, my handler? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你是我的奶妈吗？

translation.en: I'm whatever you need. I can handle anything.
translation.zh: 你要我是你的什么都行 我什么都很行

translation.en: And I've got a tight grip. And just so you know, I am not a field agent.
translation.zh: 可以弄很紧 我并不是外勤探员

translation.en: I do not go out in the field. Ever.
translation.zh: 我不必出任务

translation.en: Now, that's where all the fun is.
translation.zh: 出任务最好玩

translation.en: [chuckles nervously] Yeah, fun scares me.
translation.zh: 我怕好玩的事

translation.en: People scare me. Guns scare me. People with guns really scare me.
translation.zh: 我也怕人还有枪 我最怕拿枪的人 我一怕就会出错

translation.en: And if I'm scared, I can't do my job. And if I can't do my job, then people die.
translation.zh: 我最怕拿枪的人 我一怕就会出错 我一出错就会死人人死光我支援谁？

translation.en: And if people die, then who am I tech-supporting? Literally no one.
translation.zh: 我一出错就会死人人死光我支援谁？ 一个人都没有

translation.en: But I will make sure to keep you safe.
translation.zh: 但我会保护你的安全

translation.en: It ain't easy to keep me safe.
translation.zh: 保护我的安全并不容易

translation.en: Yeah, these bad boys are my favorite, too.
translation.zh: 我也最喜欢这些玩意

translation.en: They're called exo-gloves. DARPA's new ground combat initiative.
translation.zh: 这叫外壳手套 国防部的全新发明

translation.en: Pneumatic pistons drive the gears, quadruple the speed and power of your punches.
translation.zh: 利用气动活塞加强出拳的速度和力道

translation.en: Uh, uh-uh-uh... Nope, nope.
translation.zh: 别碰

translation.en: This is a multistage signal disruptor.
translation.zh: 这是多级信号干扰器

translation.en: It's very, very breakable.
translation.zh: 非常易碎

translation.en: Can you tell me the real reason behind the crash
translation.zh: 你能告诉我泛美航空洛克比空难

translation.en: of Pan Am Flight 103 over Lockerbie?
translation.zh: 真正的原因吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -Ah. You're one of them, aren't you?
translation.zh: 可以 你也是外星人 对吧？

translation.en: -[electronic whirring] -Hey, easy there, Rocky.
translation.zh: 小心点 洛奇

translation.en: I wasn't kidding when I said there's enough force in these bad boys
translation.zh: 我说这些手套出拳的力道

translation.en: to probably punch a hole through the fricking plane.
translation.zh: 能够打穿机舱并不是在开玩笑

translation.en: Keep screwing around. What could possibly go wrong?
translation.zh: 你继续玩啊 还会出什么错？

translation.en: That is my style, though. Yeah, good. Glad to hear it.
translation.zh: -这就是我的风格-你喜欢就好

translation.en: Oh, you know, actually,
translation.zh: 你知道吗？其实…

translation.en: I would rather if you didn't...
translation.zh: 你最好还是不要…

translation.en: That's refreshing. You actually know what you're doing down there.
translation.zh: 真难得 你很会嘛

translation.en: Yeah. That's what she said.
translation.zh: 是啊 她是这么说的

translation.en: [chuckles] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: [man speaking Tagalog] Let them pass!
translation.zh: 让他们过去！

translation.en: You need something, man?
translation.zh: 你们来这里干啥？

translation.en: Well, I heard this is a perfect place to disappear for a few days
translation.zh: 听说这地方最适合让我们消失几天

translation.en: for my crew, no questions asked.
translation.zh: 听说这地方最适合让我们消失几天 你也不会多问什么

translation.en: Hey, Mi casa es su casa, if the price is right.
translation.zh: 只要付得起钱 我家就是你家

translation.en: Perfect. Tennyson!
translation.zh: 太好了 丁尼森！

translation.en: I think you're gonna like this. I just happen to have the best hardware in the South Pacific.
translation.zh: 你一定会喜欢 南太平洋最杀的武器

translation.en: 30% off the top gets you our finest hospitality package.
translation.zh: 分我三成你们就会有最高级的享受

translation.en: 30% off the top? Do I get the girls for a weekend and two coconuts?
translation.zh: 三成？附赠美女和椰子吗？
一成

translation.en: [speaks Spanish] 10%?
translation.zh: 天啊！一成？

translation.en: You must've been aiming at the other lawless, uncharted island down the block.
translation.zh: 那是另一座无法纪小岛的价格这种事一直在发生

translation.en: Happens all the time. Here's what you do.
translation.zh: 那是另一座无法纪小岛的价格这种事一直在发生 你们乖乖回到船上 赶快滚蛋吧

translation.en: You turn around, go get your boat. You can kiss my ass.
translation.zh: 你们乖乖回到船上 赶快滚蛋吧

translation.en: Okay, hang on.
translation.zh: 好 等一下

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎样？

translation.en: You talked me into it!
translation.zh: 你说服我了！
一成八！

translation.en: You think this is a flea market?
translation.zh: 你以为这里是夜市吗？

translation.en: You think we're in the hood selling TVs and fake watches, or something like that?
translation.zh: 我专门卖山寨货吗？

translation.en: What's wrong with you, man? [speaks Spanish]
translation.zh: 你脑袋坏了吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧 两成二半

translation.en: -Twenty-two and a half. -How you gonna do "and a half"?
translation.zh: 好吧 两成二半 武器要怎么给一半？

translation.en: Twenty-two
translation.zh: 这就是两成二的

translation.en: and a half.
translation.zh: 一半

translation.en: All right, man. Enjoy this party.
translation.zh: 好吧 尽情享乐吧

translation.en: I like your style, man.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的风格

translation.en: Stay on that boat, no matter what. Adele, Nicks!
translation.zh: 不管怎样都待在船上 爱黛儿、尼克！

translation.en: All right, guys, keep your earbuds in.
translation.zh: 各位 记得戴耳机

translation.en: Like always, Adele, you're my eyes in the sky.
translation.zh: 一如往常 爱黛儿到上面当我的眼

translation.en: Nicks, you're gonna show 'em how we do it.
translation.zh: 尼克 让他们看看我们有多会玩

translation.en: You got this?
translation.zh: 你行不行？

translation.en: Just watch. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 等着瞧吧

translation.en: Can you keep this behind the bar for me?
translation.zh: 帮我把夹克放在吧台后面

translation.en: -[Bartender] What can I get you? -A cranberry and club soda.
translation.zh: 你要喝什么？ 蔓越莓果汁加苏打水

translation.en: [whispers] Let's make that two.
translation.zh: 给我来两杯

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢-不客气

translation.en: Stay focused.
translation.zh: 专心一点

translation.en: Really? [sniffs]
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: Xander Cage. Back in action.
translation.zh: 桑德凯吉又回来了

translation.en: Did I ever leave?
translation.zh: 我有离开过吗？

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 管它的

translation.en: Spotted our clown.
translation.zh: 看到那个小丑了

translation.en: Easier than expected. Drinks all around.
translation.zh: 还挺容易的 请大家一轮酒

translation.en: That's him.
translation.zh: 就是他

translation.en: What do you know? It's douchebag hunting season.
translation.zh: 棒呆了 这是人渣狩猎季节

translation.en: My favorite.
translation.zh: 我最爱了

translation.en: It's a little early in the evening to slay someone.
translation.zh: 现在杀人未免太早了点

translation.en: -Let me fix it. -[Adele] Oh, Come on.
translation.zh: -让我去搞定-别这样

translation.en: If Dance Dance Revolution doesn't deserve a bullet, I don't know who does.
translation.zh: 这家伙超讨厌 早就该被轰掉

translation.en: [Nicks] Is this a party or a funeral?
translation.zh: 这是派对还是葬礼啊？

translation.en: [woman] It's a party!
translation.zh: 是派对！

translation.en: Either way, somebody's getting turned up tonight!
translation.zh: 不管怎样都要喝到醉！

translation.en: I told you he was fun to have around.
translation.zh: 我就说他超会制造欢乐

translation.en: At first, I thought Special Forces.
translation.zh: 我一开始以为你是特种部队

translation.en: But your ink's all wrong.
translation.zh: 不过你的刺青不对

translation.en: CIA?
translation.zh: 中情局？

translation.en: They would send in a drone, bomb us to hell.
translation.zh: 他们会派无人机把我们炸成碎片

translation.en: MI6?
translation.zh: 军情六处？

translation.en: You're not the kind of subtle they prefer.
translation.zh: 你对他们来说太显眼了

translation.en: You know, the men who come to this island, they're on the run.
translation.zh: 来这座小岛的人都是逃犯

translation.en: Hiding from the world.
translation.zh: 避开全世界

translation.en: But not you.
translation.zh: 但你不是

translation.en: You're not here to hide.
translation.zh: 你不是来躲藏的

translation.en: You're looking for someone.
translation.zh: 你是来找人

translation.en: And who's to say I haven't already found her?
translation.zh: 也许我已经找到她了

translation.en: Was that meant to scare me?
translation.zh: 你想吓唬我吗？

translation.en: A little tremble would be nice.
translation.zh: 你稍微颤抖一下会很性感

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 这个嘛

translation.en: considering you're one tremble away from limping out of here...
translation.zh: 你只要再颤抖一下就会变成跛脚

translation.en: ...I'd say I'm close enough.
translation.zh: 我想我靠得够近了

translation.en: Does this mean you're not making me breakfast in the morning?
translation.zh: 所以你早上不会替我做早餐？

translation.en: I'd say you're a couple inches off.
translation.zh: 你还差了5、6公分

translation.en: Bit of a stalemate.
translation.zh: 这是个僵局

translation.en: -Not if you drop the gun. -I'm not the bad guy.
translation.zh: 你放下枪就不是 我不是坏人

translation.en: I don't believe in good guys.
translation.zh: 我不相信好人

translation.en: [Xiang] Serena?
translation.zh: 瑟琳娜？

translation.en: [speaking Mandarin] Who's your friend?
translation.zh: 他是谁？

translation.en: We just met.
translation.zh: 我们才刚认识

translation.en: But we were getting along famously until somebody
translation.zh: 我们聊得很开心 直到有人

translation.en: decided to interrupt.
translation.zh: 跑来打扰我们

translation.en: Stick to the path.
translation.zh: 别轻举妄动

translation.en: Here, honey.
translation.zh: 拿去 亲爱的

translation.en: [Xiang] There's a lot of unmarked graves on the island.
translation.zh: 这座岛上有很多无名墓

translation.en: I'll bet whoever sold you that shirt is in one of them.
translation.zh: 卖你花衬衫的人一定也被埋在下面

translation.en: And how long do you intend to push your luck?
translation.zh: 你打算冒多大的风险？

translation.en: Until I get what I came for.
translation.zh: 直到我达到我来的目的

translation.en: Which is what exactly?
translation.zh: 你到底有什么目的？

translation.en: [speaking Mandarin] A damn, strong drink.
translation.zh: 对 他妈烈的酒

translation.en: So, let's be real and talk about what we all really want.
translation.zh: 咱们不如老实谈谈我们想要什么

translation.en: I'm only here for that.
translation.zh: 我只是为了那个而来

translation.en: And in my mind, you guys could walk away nicely. Unless you want to continue our foreplay.
translation.zh: 你们可以全身而退 除非你想继续玩

translation.en: Power like that doesn't belong in anyone's hands.
translation.zh: 没有人应该拥有那么大的权力

translation.en: Just improvising.
translation.zh: 只是随机应变

translation.en: [Adele] Mate, seriously? A grenade? What is this? Eastern Europe in the early '90s?
translation.zh: 手榴弹？这是90年代早期的东欧吗？

translation.en: -Next, he's gonna send you a fax. -[snickers]
translation.zh: 接下来他会传真给你

translation.en: So, you're willing to kill...
translation.zh: 你为了占有那玩意

translation.en: just to keep that for yourself?
translation.zh: 愿意杀任何人？

translation.en: That's the wrong question to ask.
translation.zh: 你不该这样问

translation.en: What's the right question?
translation.zh: 我该怎么问？

translation.en: "Are you willing to die for it?"
translation.zh: 你愿意为它死吗？

translation.en: One grenade, three people.
translation.zh: 一枚手榴弹 三个人

translation.en: I like the odds.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这种机率

translation.en: Two grenades, three people.
translation.zh: 两枚手榴弹 三个人

translation.en: I'm loving these odds.
translation.zh: 我更喜欢这种机率

translation.en: You ever bleed so much, when you open your eyes, all you see is red?
translation.zh: 你曾流血过多 眼前都是一片红吗？

translation.en: When you have fought war on every continent...
translation.zh: 当你在每个大陆都打过仗

translation.en: [Adele] Come on, X, just say the word. Let me put both these assholes out to pasture.
translation.zh: 你一声令下我就毙了那两个人渣

translation.en: ...you expect death.
translation.zh: 你知道自己随时都会死

translation.en: -Our bodies are such fragile things. -Come on. Let me shoot him.
translation.zh: -人的身体很脆弱-快 让我射死他

translation.en: Death sometimes just...
translation.zh: 有时候死神会

translation.en: sneaks up on you.
translation.zh: 突然找上你

translation.en: [Adele] It's been a while since I played hot potato.
translation.zh: 我很久没玩烫手山芋游戏

translation.en: [Xiang] I'm in this hospital bed. I'm barely conscious. Delirious.
translation.zh: 我曾躺在一张病床 意识模糊不清 被自己的血淹没

translation.en: Drowning in my own blood.
translation.zh: 意识模糊不清 被自己的血淹没

translation.en: And all I can hear myself think is, "Today's the day.
translation.zh: 我心里只想着“就是今天了”

translation.en: Today's the day you die."
translation.zh: ”今天是你的死期“

translation.en: I'm touched.
translation.zh: 真是感人肺腑

translation.en: -Can I have my jacket, when you get a sec? -Okay.
translation.zh: 请把我的夹克给我

translation.en: Then a man comes along, tells me a story
translation.zh: 有个人找上我 跟我说一个故事

translation.en: about a drought in California.
translation.zh: 关于加州的大旱灾

translation.en: About skateboards and swimming pools.
translation.zh: 滑板和泳池

translation.en: About a man named Xander Cage.
translation.zh: 还有一个叫桑德凯吉的男人

translation.en: Oh, shit. He's Triple-X.
translation.zh: 天啊 他也是极限特工

translation.en: I heard he was dead.
translation.zh: 听说他挂了

translation.en: Is he?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: We are all Triple-X.
translation.zh: 我们都是极限特工

translation.en: We just have different agendas.
translation.zh: 只是有不同的目的

translation.en: She wants to destroy it.
translation.zh: 她想要毁了它

translation.en: I'm gonna use it.
translation.zh: 我想要利用它

translation.en: And I'll be damned if I'm gonna let you take it back to the NSA.
translation.zh: 我死都不会让你把它带回国安局

translation.en: Now, it's a party.
translation.zh: 这才算是派对嘛

translation.en: Everybody, get down! Move! Move!
translation.zh: 大家都趴下！动作快！

translation.en: Shit's about to go down.
translation.zh: 要出事了

translation.en: You ready to have some fun?
translation.zh: 好好来玩一场

translation.en: [speaking Russian] Turn the music off!
translation.zh: 把音乐关掉！

translation.en: Stop it!
translation.zh: 关掉！

translation.en: Everybody, hands up! Now!
translation.zh: 大家都把手举起来！ 快点！

translation.en: On the floor!
translation.zh: 趴在地上！

translation.en: First person to move, first person to die!
translation.zh: 谁敢先动谁就先死！

translation.en: I moved.
translation.zh: 我动了

translation.en: [chuckles] I just moved again. I'm still alive.
translation.zh: 我又动了 我并没有死

translation.en: [soldier] Shut up, "hero"!
translation.zh: 闭嘴 “英雄”！

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: 动手吧

translation.en: Don't move!
translation.zh: 别动！

translation.en: Okay, I actually have what you want.
translation.zh: 其实我有你要的东西

translation.en: Pandora's Box?
translation.zh: 潘多拉之盒？

translation.en: I got it right here.
translation.zh: 它就在我身上

translation.en: But you're wrong, though.
translation.zh: 不过你错了

translation.en: You take it from me, and you die first.
translation.zh: 你敢把它抢走你就会先死

translation.en: Then Lieutenant Leningrad, who thinks he's got your back.
translation.zh: 然后轮到掩护你的列宁格勒同志

translation.en: Then the two Ivans by the door.
translation.zh: 再来就是门口的两位伊凡同志

translation.en: Moscow Mule by the bar.
translation.zh: 吧台旁边的莫斯科笨驴

translation.en: And then Igor on the stairs.
translation.zh: 最后是楼梯上的伊果同志

translation.en: See where we're going with this?
translation.zh: 这样懂我的意思吧？

translation.en: But none of that matters.
translation.zh: 不过这都不重要

translation.en: 'Cause like I said,
translation.zh: 因为我说过

translation.en: if you take this from me, you die first.
translation.zh: 你敢把它抢走 你就会先死

translation.en: I'll take it from you dead or alive.
translation.zh: 不管死活我都会把它抢走

translation.en: And if you hold it too tight, I cut your arm off.
translation.zh: 你握得太紧我就把你的手砍断

translation.en: Suit yourself.
translation.zh: 随你便

translation.en: -[people screaming] -Leningrad.
translation.zh: 列宁格勒

translation.en: Hi, Ivan. Other Ivan.
translation.zh: 嗨 伊凡 另一个伊凡

translation.en: Ooh, bye-bye, Moscow Mule.
translation.zh: 再见了 莫斯科笨驴

translation.en: Igor. That's another one you owe me, X.
translation.zh: 伊果 X老大 你又欠我一命

translation.en: [over earpiece] Read between the lines.
translation.zh: 注意我的中指

translation.en: Tennyson! Some back-up would be nice.
translation.zh: 丁尼森 我们需要支持

translation.en: -Huh? -Some back-up would be nice! Come on, man!
translation.zh: 我们需要支持 快点！

translation.en: X said stay on the boat.
translation.zh: X老大要我待在船上

translation.en: That was before the goddamn Russian invasion touched down, man!
translation.zh: 那是在俄罗斯佬入侵之前

translation.en: X said stay on the boat.
translation.zh: X老大要我待在船上

translation.en: You want to play?
translation.zh: 你想玩吗？

translation.en: That doesn't belong in anyone's hands.
translation.zh: 那玩意不属于任何人

translation.en: You want it, come and get it.
translation.zh: 你想要…尽管来抢啊

translation.en: Was that necessary?
translation.zh: 那真的有必要吗？

translation.en: It's what Gibbons would have wanted.
translation.zh: 那是吉本斯想要的

translation.en: [Adele] X!
translation.zh: X老大！

translation.en: X.
translation.zh: X老大

translation.en: It happened again. Another satellite fell.
translation.zh: 又有一颗人造卫星坠落

translation.en: Us working as a team.
translation.zh: 我们像个团队一起合作

translation.en: That's what Gibbons would've wanted.
translation.zh: 那才是吉本斯想要的

translation.en: You in?
translation.zh: 你加不加入？

translation.en: [newscaster] An explosion inside the Olympic Stadium rocks Moscow.
translation.zh: 奥运体育馆大爆炸震撼莫斯科 （现场直播卫星撞击俄国体育馆）

translation.en: Seven workers are now confirmed dead, with at least 25 others injured
translation.zh: 七名工作人员确认丧命 至少25人因为这场暴力行为受伤

translation.en: in this senseless act of violence.
translation.zh: 至少25人因为这场暴力行为受伤

translation.en: A source inside the Pentagon says a rogue satellite
translation.zh: 五角大厦的内部来源透露 一颗失灵的人造卫星可能被用来当作武器

translation.en: may have been used as a weapon. This was the rumor...
translation.zh: 一颗失灵的人造卫星可能被用来当作武器

translation.en: Guess this means Pandora's Box isn't exactly classified.
translation.zh: 我猜潘多拉之盒不算是最高机密

translation.en: [newscaster] In a new video released just moments ago, an anonymous group
translation.zh: 在稍早发表的全新视频之中 一个匿名组织声称能用人造卫星当武器

translation.en: is claiming to have the ability to use satellites as weapons.
translation.zh: 一个匿名组织声称能用人造卫星当武器

translation.en: They claim "that the violation of civil liberties
translation.zh: 并说“侵犯世界公民自由的行为”

translation.en: of all the citizens of the world is an atrocity that must be stopped."
translation.zh: 并说“侵犯世界公民自由的行为” “是一项必须被阻止的暴行”

translation.en: [distorted voice] Disable and dismantle all the world's spy programs within the next 24 hours,
translation.zh: 在24小时内解除全球的情报系统

translation.en: or I'll do it for you, one satellite at a time.
translation.zh: （独家视讯） 不然我就会继续破坏人造卫星

translation.en: There are 30,000 satellites orbiting the Earth at this moment.
translation.zh: 目前有3万颗人造卫星绕行地球轨道

translation.en: I will drop one satellite every 24 hours until my demands are met.
translation.zh: 我每24小时都会让一颗卫星坠落直到你们履行我的要求

translation.en: Eyewitnesses in Moscow...
translation.zh: 莫斯科的目击者…

translation.en: -Was this always part of your mission too? -Of course not.
translation.zh: -这也是你们的计划？-当然不是

translation.en: We were a new Triple-X team Gibbons created.
translation.zh: 我们是吉本斯征召的全新xXx小组

translation.en: We discovered a high-level intelligence officer was trying to manipulate satellites.
translation.zh: 一名情报单位高阶主管想操纵人造卫星

translation.en: And even before we could unmask him, Gibbons was killed.
translation.zh: 我们在揭露他的身份之前 吉本斯就遇害

translation.en: [Xander] So, you knew they were Triple-X all along.
translation.zh: 你早就知道他们是极限特工

translation.en: I needed you to retain a sense of objectivity.
translation.zh: 我需要你保持客观

translation.en: I don't understand. If I destroyed Pandora's Box, what happened in Moscow?
translation.zh: 我毁了潘多拉之盒莫斯科怎么会遭袭？

translation.en: If I'm right, which I am,
translation.zh: 如果我猜得没错

translation.en: this box only ever had the ability to control one satellite.
translation.zh: 这个盒子只能控制一颗人造卫星

translation.en: What does that mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: It means we've been chasing a prototype.
translation.zh: 这只是一个设计原型

translation.en: [Tennyson] And these guys have the real one? Yeah.
translation.zh: -完成品在那些人手上？-对

translation.en: Serena played us for fools.
translation.zh: 瑟琳娜把我们当傻瓜耍着玩

translation.en: Betrayed us.
translation.zh: 她背叛了我们

translation.en: [Xiang] This isn't about Serena. This is war.
translation.zh: 别再管她 这是战争

translation.en: And either we stop it today, or we watch the world burn tomorrow.
translation.zh: 今天不阻止他们 明天就是世界末日

translation.en: -Can't lose focus on that. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -大家不要忘记这一点-对

translation.en: Where you been? You stop off for the old rub-and-tug?
translation.zh: 你去了哪儿？色情按摩店？

translation.en: -Your mom says hi. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 你老妈问你好

translation.en: Tracker on board? Nobody saw you?
translation.zh: 追踪器装好了吗？有人看到你吗？

translation.en: -Nobody ever sees me, boss. -Good.
translation.zh: -谁也看不到我-很好

translation.en: [Xander] Now, these suits control every spy satellite in the sky.
translation.zh: 这些人控制每一颗间谍卫星

translation.en: But how often do these seven men all sit in the same room together?
translation.zh: 这七个人多久会一起开会？

translation.en: [Marke] Almost never.
translation.zh: 几乎不会

translation.en: [Xander] And if you needed retinal scans,
translation.zh: 如果你需要视网膜扫描

translation.en: cell phone data dumps, biometrics of all the superpowers in the world,
translation.zh: 数据转储、全球强国的生物识别技术

translation.en: -who would you target? -Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 你的攻击目标会是谁？ 该死

translation.en: [Xander] Who has that kind of power to actually set that in motion?
translation.zh: 谁有权力掌控这一切？

translation.en: Oh, you're pissing up the wrong tree, Cage. I came looking for you, remember?
translation.zh: 你搞错对象了 是我找上你的记得吗？

translation.en: Oh, asshole... We gonna have problems?
translation.zh: 浑球 有问题吗？

translation.en: Oh, no problem. How was your trip?
translation.zh: 没问题 空降顺利吗？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -I'm just doing the math.
translation.zh: 我正在数数

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What math?
translation.zh: 数什么数？

translation.en: Air velocity divided by distance.
translation.zh: 风速除以距离

translation.en: So, when I stuff you down the toilet,
translation.zh: 我把你冲下马桶 搜救人员才知道

translation.en: Search and rescue will know where to find you between China and North Korea.
translation.zh: 我把你冲下马桶 搜救人员才知道 该在中国和北韩之间的哪里找你

translation.en: Keep talking shit, little man.
translation.zh: 尽管耍嘴皮子吧 矮子

translation.en: Yeah, hold that thought, G.I. Joe.
translation.zh: 没空理你 玩具大兵

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Roll it back.
translation.zh: 倒回去

translation.en: A little more. More.
translation.zh: 再多一点 多一点

translation.en: -A little more. Stop. -[glass shattering]
translation.zh: 再多一点 停

translation.en: Okay, when Xiang broke the window,
translation.zh: 好 当翔破窗而入

translation.en: he's the only one that didn't flinch.
translation.zh: 只有他没被吓到

translation.en: I need the President on the phone...
translation.zh: 帮我接总统

translation.en: That's not gonna come off, you know that, right? I'll have to replace the goddamn screen.
translation.zh: 那擦不掉呀 我得换掉电脑屏幕

translation.en: I've been saying the Director of the CIA has been trying to destroy the world for years.
translation.zh: 我就说中情局局长一直想要毁灭全世界

translation.en: Okay, we have carte blanche to track this son of a bitch down.
translation.zh: 现在可以动用一切资源追捕他

translation.en: Do any of you know how to do it?
translation.zh: 有谁知道该怎么找到他？

translation.en: The same way Xiang and I found Pandora's Box in New York.
translation.zh: 用我和翔找到潘多拉之盒的方法

translation.en: Pandora's Box needs to keep reconnecting itself because the satellites orbit.
translation.zh: 因为卫星的轨道潘多拉之盒必须不断重连网络

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Uh...
translation.zh: 借过一下

translation.en: All we need to do is track down the main signal,
translation.zh: 只要追踪到主要的信号

translation.en: and then we can approximate its location within a 20-mile radius.
translation.zh: 就能缩小到方圆32公里的范围

translation.en: [Adele] Of all the places in the world to lay low,
translation.zh: 有这么多地方可以躲

translation.en: this fruit loop chooses Detroit?
translation.zh: 这个疯子选择了底特律？

translation.en: [male reporter] These blasts did take place in Moscow, but they were felt around the world.
translation.zh: 莫斯科大爆炸撼动了全世界

translation.en: Good morning. As feared, the death toll in the Moscow tragedy is rising.
translation.zh: 这场悲剧的死亡人数不断增加

translation.en: -In addition to the latest deaths... -Let me guess.
translation.zh: 除了死伤惨重以外… 我猜各国都在急着解除情报系统

translation.en: Everyone's jumping at the chance to dismantle their spy programs.
translation.zh: 我猜各国都在急着解除情报系统

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 并没有

translation.en: The world's too stupid to realize that Moscow wasn't a bluff.
translation.zh: 他们都蠢到不知道我并不是虚张声势

translation.en: [Marke] Okay, Triple-X, you will base out of an NSA safe house.
translation.zh: 国安局的安全屋是你们的基地

translation.en: Becky will coordinate earbud communications and have the signal disruptor on standby.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Way too many. Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 敌人太多了 咱们走

translation.en: Get back! Come on!
translation.zh: 跟我们走！

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 糟糕！

translation.en: [Becky] Oh, my, God, I'm gonna die.
translation.zh: 我死定了

translation.en: [NSA Agent] Move! Push forward!
translation.zh: 快点！ 向前冲！

translation.en: [Adele] This is all we've got.
translation.zh: 我们只剩下刀子了

translation.en: [NSA Agent] Pin 'em! Pin 'em down!
translation.zh: 困住他们！

translation.en: Damn! I'm out of bullets. You got any?
translation.zh: 我没子弹了 你有吗？

translation.en: No. Nothing.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: I'm empty.
translation.zh: 我也没了

translation.en: -We go on three. -Okay.
translation.zh: -数到三就一起上-好

translation.en: Wassup?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: Rock, paper, scissor, grenade launcher.
translation.zh: 剪刀、石头、布…火箭炮

translation.en: Darius Stone.
translation.zh: 达瑞斯史东

translation.en: Triple-X since 2005.
translation.zh: 2005年起就是极限特工

translation.en: Thanks for the assist.
translation.zh: 多谢相助

translation.en: X takes care of its own.
translation.zh: 极限特工会照顾自己人

translation.en: [sighs] You got to be kidding.
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: We failed.
translation.zh: 我们失败了

translation.en: [Serena] Xander, Marke activated the satellite and it's headed right for us.
translation.zh: 桑德 马克启动了卫星正朝着我们飞来

translation.en: I'm gonna have to take it out kamikaze style.
translation.zh: 我要学神风特攻队把它打下来

translation.en: Don't do it. It's suicide. Nobody could survive that fall.
translation.zh: 那是自杀行动 你必死无疑

translation.en: Oh, and tell Nicks to have that camera ready.
translation.zh: 叫尼克把摄影机准备好

translation.en: Low-orbit freefall, no chute and big fireworks.
translation.zh: 不用降落伞进行低轨道自由落体还是会一团大火球

translation.en: They say it's the last great adventure.
translation.zh: 听说那是最刺激的冒险

translation.en: Be sure to send a postcard.
translation.zh: 记得要寄明信片喔

translation.en: I live for this shit.
translation.zh: 我就是为了追求刺激而活

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [Xander] Nicks, I hope you got that on camera!
translation.zh: 尼克 希望你拍到这一切！

translation.en: If it ain't on video, it didn't happen!
translation.zh: 没拍到就等于没发生过！

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Hall of Fame shit right here, bro.
translation.zh: 当然有啰 这是殿堂级表现

translation.en: You know I could've done that, right?
translation.zh: 我也做得到

translation.en: -Bullshit. -Shut up.
translation.zh: -屁啦-闭嘴！

translation.en: What happened to Marke?
translation.zh: 马克怎么了？

translation.en: The ground broke her fall.
translation.zh: 她摔到地上挂掉了

translation.en: Still don't believe in good guys?
translation.zh: 你还是不相信好人？

translation.en: It's okay if you're a little bad.
translation.zh: 男人不坏 女人不爱

translation.en: How bad?
translation.zh: 你喜欢多坏？

translation.en: Now, that right there,
translation.zh: 你刚才那一招

translation.en: that was a hell of an entrance.
translation.zh: 才算是精彩的表演

translation.en: That's a hell of a car.
translation.zh: 好拉风的车

translation.en: Yeah. Gibbons told me to keep an eye on it.
translation.zh: 吉本斯要我好好保管它

translation.en: He said I'd know why when I need to know why.
translation.zh: 他说到时候我就会知道原因

translation.en: Now I know why.
translation.zh: 现在我知道了

translation.en: It's exactly the way I left it.
translation.zh: 它跟我记得的一模一样

translation.en: I took it on a date or two.
translation.zh: 我开着它约过几次会

translation.en: [Xander] X takes care of its own.
translation.zh: 极限特工会照顾自己人

translation.en: That's why I figured you'd come through.
translation.zh: 所以我知道你一定会来救我们

translation.en: To get a chance to work with the legendary Xander Cage?
translation.zh: 谁不想跟传奇的桑德凯吉合作？

translation.en: Where do I sign up?
translation.zh: 我要去哪里报名？

translation.en: Now you know, you done pissed on the wrong damn picnic.
translation.zh: 你要知道 你惹毛了全世界的情报单位

translation.en: The whole world gonna be looking for us.
translation.zh: 他们全都会来找我们

translation.en: I wouldn't have it any other way.
translation.zh: 正合我意

translation.en: [soloist] We thought we'd end with Augustus' favorite song.
translation.zh: 我们要放奥古斯的爱歌做为结尾

translation.en: -Wow, that's an impressive trick. -What?
translation.zh: 哇 你起死回生啦 怎么了？

translation.en: Think you're the only one who knows how to play dead?
translation.zh: 你以为只有你会装死吗？

translation.en: Gotcha.
translation.zh: 骗到你了

translation.en: This is some pretty surreal shit, being at your own funeral.
translation.zh: 参加自己的葬礼很不真实

translation.en: I love that song.
translation.zh: 我超爱那首歌

translation.en: And it could be a wonderful world,
translation.zh: 世界可以变得很美好

translation.en: if we just stopped doing bad shit to it.
translation.zh: 只要人类不再做各种坏事

translation.en: If you wanted me out of retirement, you could've just asked me.
translation.zh: 你要我重返江湖 直说不就好了

translation.en: You always responded to less subtle motivation.
translation.zh: 事情不闹大 恐怕叫不动你

translation.en: Now what?
translation.zh: 现在我该做什么？

translation.en: You keep being the rebel the world doesn't know it needs.
translation.zh: 继续当一个大家都不知道的叛逆英雄

translation.en: Watch the watchers. Fight the enemy within.
translation.zh: 监视掌权者 从内部打击敌人

translation.en: Damn, that's so complicated.
translation.zh: 这太复杂了

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Let me simplify it for you.
translation.zh: 简单来说

translation.en: Kick some ass.
translation.zh: 痛扁坏蛋

translation.en: Get the girl.
translation.zh: 追女人

translation.en: And try to look dope while you're doing it.
translation.zh: 试着装得很酷

translation.en: You can do "dope," can't you?
translation.zh: 你会装酷 对吧？

translation.en: Sure you can.
translation.zh: 你一定会

translation.en: -[Gibbons] Junior, let's bounce! -I'll see you later, X.
translation.zh: 小子 咱们走 回头见 X老大

translation.en: I can definitely make that work.
translation.zh: 我绝对会装酷

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: 咱们上

translation.en: You got me.
translation.zh: 你骗到我了

translation.en: [chuckles] Gotcha.
translation.zh: 骗到你了

translation.en: I'm not a soldier, I'm a baller.
translation.zh: 我不是士兵 我是玩家

translation.en: I'll see you later, X.
translation.zh: 回头见 X老大

translation.en: Sure you can.
translation.zh: 你一定会

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -[gunshot]
translation.zh: 再見啦
